TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Toda, title = Toda, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toda} }

S.FORM: = Toda = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang Toda. 252 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 795 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 97% niqan 773 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 3% niqan 22 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, kleelug hari ka nseejiq alang nii. Hangan alang alang Toda Tnteanak knmalu alang Wa mniq jen-ay syang Toda cun ka alang Toda, pndaan tyyayung yayung Mtudu, niqan dwiyaq Wey-san(2682m) ka hnraan hidaw, niqan sapah paysan tutipiq ka alang ruwan. Nniqan na Nan-tou seyn jen-ay syang Toda cun. Llabang na Wa mniq Rusan dxral tudaya 7km, ssipaw iril yayung Mtudu. Lnglingay na ti-ri 交通資訊Ddwiyaq haypa 1200m. Patas kklaun ndaan tpaan Mriq rulu: kndadax Tay-14seyn mlutuc 85 seyn mrmux. Mwaluk dieyn-c ti-tu dieyn-c ti-tu alang. Kluwan tnsediq alang Sediq. Kari ddiyun Kari Sediq,kari Tlu. Snhiyan kyokay Kyokay sing-yey-su,kyokay cyo-ro,kyokay deyn-cu Pnyahan alang Wa mniq tudaya dxral 7km Rusan ka alang Pingcing, ssipaw iril yayung mtudu, ddwiyaq tuhunacdwiyaq wey-san, wa qnlangan ddwiyaq ka spac muhing na, ou balay mshrus na dxral, wana bay mkyyungan niqan cikuh hari brnux, ngalan dha phangan brnux Toda, pnspuwan na mhiyu alang 4: Tonbarah:Wa mniq tuhunac bay dxral brnux Pingcing, kiya pwla bay psupu smalu alang. Sga:Wa mniq tubaraw bay dxral brnux Pingcing. Rucau:Wa mniq baraw dxral mshrus muxul Rucau. Brah kngkawas Tlu 4(kngkawas 1908) idas 12 cka na"cckulan ddaun qquri Paran Ay-young-cung", prading u hmntur kmciyuk qmptingan cckulan ddaun nii ka sediq nToda, kiya ka mniq hngkawas bukuy idas 1 diyax 2 dhuq 7 daw, Kndadax cwey-fong cmbu paru puniq kana alang Toda, nou bay cmiyuk ka rrisaw mbiyax alang uka rrihan uri, kiya kndadax hini ini bay knbiyax cmiyuk Tanah Tunux ka alang nii, brah kngkawas1(knkawas1908) idas 1diyax 16 pnsdhu kari keysacu Tanah Tunux mi sediq nToda, bukuy daw mntna na kngkawas idas 8 mniq alang nii, brah kngkawas1(knkawas1908) idas 1diyax 16 pnsdhu kari keysacu Tanah Tunux mi sediq nToda, bukuy daw mntna na kngkawas idas 8 mniq alang Tonbarah phiyu "sapah ptasan Toda "(sapah ptasan Pingcing saya). Bukuy ndaan Paran nii pa, miicu sediqToda cmiyuk ka keysacu Tanah Tunux, kiya pskyuxay dmka tnsapah wada na dhdilan alang Snuwil, id ana pswayay ka biyax dha; kiya uri u mniq kkaalang psmalu ini pnsdungus, kiya ka msshuun, pseuka lnglungan cmiyuk Tanah Tunux; Kingal uri, plwanun na ka wa thiyaq alang sslian dxral brnuxToda, kiya sa pswaaw qmita, kiya peyyah hini daw, wada pspuwan Tanah Tunux ka alang nii ngakan hangan alang Toda, ngalun Tlu ka Taywan nii daw ryuxun hangan Pingcing da. Nniqan alang saya nii u psnakun na: Alang tuhunac sapah ptasan Pingcing mi wa niqan saoah paysan Pingcing u kiya paru bay alang Tnbarah;Sga mi Ayu ka mquri tudaya; Sing-yey-su kyokay,sslian ddaun alang, sslian bbriyun phpah mi nniqan habung alang nii u wa mniq Rucau kiya. Pnklaun pnatas rmiyaw mi qqtaan pusu bay pnhyuwan dxral Natou seyn-ri sapah paysan tutipiq "546"Natou seyn jenay syangToda cun hwa-guwan ru 17 hawp Qntaan pnatas Patas Natou seyn jenay syang kong-swe wan-can

= Toda = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang Toda. 252 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 795 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 97% niqan 773 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 3% niqan 22 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, kleelog hari ka nseejiq alang nii. Hangan alang alang Toda Tnteanak knmalo alang Wa mniq jen-ay syang Toda con ka alang Toda, pndaan tyyayong yayong Mtodo, niqan dwiyaq Wey-san(2682m) ka hnraan hidaw, niqan sapah paysan totipiq ka alang rowan. Nniqan na Nan-too seyn jen-ay syang Toda con. Llabang na Wa mniq Rosan dxral todaya 7km, ssipaw iril yayong Mtodo. Lnglingay na ti-ri 交通資訊Ddwiyaq haypa 1200m. Patas kklaon ndaan tpaan Mriq rolo: kndadax Tay-14seyn mlotoc 85 seyn mrmox. Mwalok dieyn-c ti-to dieyn-c ti-to alang. Klowan tnsediq alang Sediq. Kari ddiyon Kari Sediq,kari Tlo. Snhiyan kyokay Kyokay sing-yey-so,kyokay cyo-ro,kyokay deyn-co Pnyahan alang Wa mniq todaya dxral 7km Rosan ka alang Pingcing, ssipaw iril yayong mtodo, ddwiyaq tohonacdwiyaq wey-san, wa qnlangan ddwiyaq ka spac mohing na, oo balay mshros na dxral, wana bay mkyyongan niqan cikoh hari brnox, ngalan dha phangan brnox Toda, pnspowan na mhiyo alang 4: Tonbarah:Wa mniq tohonac bay dxral brnox Pingcing, kiya pwla bay psopo smalo alang. Sga:Wa mniq tobaraw bay dxral brnox Pingcing. Rocao:Wa mniq baraw dxral mshros moxol Rocao. Brah kngkawas Tlo 4(kngkawas 1908) idas 12 cka na"cckolan ddaon qqori Paran Ay-yoong-cong", prading o hmntor kmciyok qmptingan cckolan ddaon nii ka sediq nToda, kiya ka mniq hngkawas bokoy idas 1 diyax 2 dhoq 7 daw, Kndadax cwey-fong cmbo paro poniq kana alang Toda, noo bay cmiyok ka rrisaw mbiyax alang oka rrihan ori, kiya kndadax hini ini bay knbiyax cmiyok Tanah Tonox ka alang nii, brah kngkawas1(knkawas1908) idas 1diyax 16 pnsdho kari keysaco Tanah Tonox mi sediq nToda, bokoy daw mntna na kngkawas idas 8 mniq alang nii, brah kngkawas1(knkawas1908) idas 1diyax 16 pnsdho kari keysaco Tanah Tonox mi sediq nToda, bokoy daw mntna na kngkawas idas 8 mniq alang Tonbarah phiyo "sapah ptasan Toda "(sapah ptasan Pingcing saya). Bokoy ndaan Paran nii pa, miico sediqToda cmiyok ka keysaco Tanah Tonox, kiya pskyoxay dmka tnsapah wada na dhdilan alang Snowil, id ana pswayay ka biyax dha; kiya ori o mniq kkaalang psmalo ini pnsdongos, kiya ka msshoon, pseoka lnglongan cmiyok Tanah Tonox; Kingal ori, plwanon na ka wa thiyaq alang sslian dxral brnoxToda, kiya sa pswaaw qmita, kiya peyyah hini daw, wada pspowan Tanah Tonox ka alang nii ngakan hangan alang Toda, ngalon Tlo ka Taywan nii daw ryoxon hangan Pingcing da. Nniqan alang saya nii o psnakon na: Alang tohonac sapah ptasan Pingcing mi wa niqan saoah paysan Pingcing o kiya paro bay alang Tnbarah;Sga mi Ayo ka mqori todaya; Sing-yey-so kyokay,sslian ddaon alang, sslian bbriyon phpah mi nniqan habong alang nii o wa mniq Rocao kiya. Pnklaon pnatas rmiyaw mi qqtaan poso bay pnhyowan dxral Natoo seyn-ri sapah paysan totipiq "546"Natoo seyn jenay syangToda con hwa-gowan ro 17 hawp Qntaan pnatas Patas Natoo seyn jenay syang kong-swe wan-can
